snippet.title: Sword of the Necromancer: Resurrection - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Prepare to descend into the crypt of the Necromancer! Sword of the Necromancer: Resurrection is now available for Steam, Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox One and Xbox Series!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2782880/Sword_of_the_Necromancer_Resurrection/
https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/sword-of-the-necromancer-resurrection-switch/
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013154
https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/sword-of-the-necromancer-resurrection/9msx644fwprz

Help Tama to save Koko using the powers of the forbidden Sword of the Necromancer. Turn your foes into allies and reach the depths of the Necromancer's dungeon. Gain enough power to bring Koko back from the dead, no matter the cost. Now in 3D and with a renewed battle system!
